title: Callimachos with Cyrillic
content:
Hello Typophiles!

Callimachos - not Kallimachos :) -is a title font for jobs that need a hand-drawn, bold feel.

My main problem is that I can't speak Russian nor I am familiar with the Cyrillic alphabet.

I'm trying to achieve the Cyrillic version looking at other font structures and apply the style of the others glyphs - bet it has many inconsistencies or/and bug.

Would anyone help me, please, to correct the Cyrillic glyphs?

Thank you in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416063447im_/http:/typophile.com/files/callimachos_test_02_5_4145.jpg)
